name: Service Layer Pattern
description: Business logic layer that sits between controllers and repositories

steps.title: Inject in Controller
steps.description: Use constructor injection to wire service

steps.title: Add Unit Tests
steps.description: Mock repository and test service methods

notes: Keep business logic in service layer, not in controllers or repositories
Use @Transactional for methods that modify data
Prefer constructor injection over field injection
One service per aggregate root (avoid God classes)
